script.title: Entity Read
script.description: Imports the latest entity read files into BigQuery.
instructions: Provide one or more DBM partners ( comma seperated ).
Entity read files are read using your user credentials.
Entity read files are written using the chosen service credentials.
All, even the public ones, entity read file will be prefixed by Entity_.
CAUTION: ENTITY READ FILES ARE PARTNER LEVEL, NO ADVERTISER IDS.
